title: My debit card company charges me when I withdraw money from ATM, is this ok or riba? Assim al hakeem
transcript: have from Bangladesh he says debit card I have a debit card I charge it with $100 it's mine I can use it until the $100 is over there's no overdraft but if I go to the ATM machine and I withdraw $50 the company of the debit card charges me a dollar or two is this Halal the answer is yes this is your money you you are withdrawing your money you're not borrowing so this is their service charge and there's no problem in that
